title: Sound On: House Rules Chair McGovern on Debt, Budget
itunes:title: Sound On: House Rules Chair McGovern on Debt, Budget
description:
Massachusetts Democrat James McGovern, Chairman of the House Rules Committee, Mick Mulvaney, Founder of Exegis Capital and former OMB Director and former acting White House Chief of Staff, Moody's Chief Economist Mark Zandi, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Massachusetts Democrat James McGovern, Chairman of the House Rules Committee, Mick Mulvaney, Founder of Exegis Capital and former OMB Director and former acting White House Chief of Staff, Moody's Chief Economist Mark Zandi, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
